get.description: Get an Account identified by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Mural Account ID

parameters.name: on-behalf-of
parameters.description: Organization ID to act on behalf of

id.description: The unique identifier for the Account

isApiEnabled.description: Whether or not the Account can be managed by the API. Accounts created in the platform will not be enabled unless you grant API access to the Account in the platform.

status.description: The status of the Account. Will start in INITIALIZING and move to ACTIVE once the Account is ready to use.

accountDetails.description: The details of the Account. Will only be populated once the status is ACTIVE

blockchain.description: The underlying blockchain for the Account. Accounts can only have one blockchain.

balances.description: The balances associated with the account. There can be multiple if the Account belongs to an organization with multiple tokens enabled.

depositAccount.description: Deprecated in favor of payinMethods. Please use payinMethods going forward. The virtual account details for the Account. This will only be populated if the Account belongs to an Organization that has completed the appropriate KYC procedures. See specific KYC documentation for more details.

payinMethods.description: The payin methods for the Account.

status.description: The status of the payin method.

supportedDestinationTokens.description: The destination tokens that the payin fiat can be converted to

fees.description: The fees for the payin method.

variableFeePercentage.description: Total variable fee percentage for the payin, applied to the payin fiat currency amount. A value of 0.1 should be viewed as 0.1%

fixedTransactionFee.description: The fixed fee for the transaction for the payin (in the fiat currency of the payin method)

developerFeePercentage.description: Developer fee percentage for the payin, applied to the payin fiat currency amount. A value of 2.5 should be viewed as 2.5%

token.description: The token for which the fees are being calculated.

transactionMinimum.description: The minimum transaction amount for the payin (In the fiat currency of the payin method)

bankAccountType.description: The type of bank account (checking or savings).

contractAddress.description: The contract address of the token
The contract address of the token

senderAddress.description: The sender address for the deposit. If this is defined, the deposits MUST be made to from this address.

destinationAddress.description: The destination address for the deposit.

post.description: Get all Payout Requests associated with the provided Organization ID and filtered by the provided statuses.

parameters.name: on-behalf-of
parameters.description: Organization ID to act on behalf of

filter.description: Filter payouts. See the filter type for more details. An empty filter will result in all payouts being returned.

oneOf.description: Filter based on the status of the Payout Request. A Payout that matches any of the provided statuses will be returned

transactionHash.description: The transaction hash of the blockchain transaction. Present when the status is EXECUTED.

status.description: The status of the overall payout request. The initial status is AWAITING_EXECUTION, and the status will change to PENDING. EXECUTED, FAILED, and CANCELED are terminal statuses. EXECUTED indicates the blockchain transaction associated with the entire payout has been executed, but that does not mean your recipients have received funds. Check the individual recipientsPayoutDetails for the status of each recipient.

payouts.description: Information associated with each recipient's payout included in the original payout request.

oneOf.title: Fiat Payout

fiatAndRailCode.description: The fiat and rail code, if applicable, for the payout. This corresponds to the type discriminator of the fiatAndRailDetails field in the payout request.

oneOf.title: Payout Created Status
oneOf.description: Status when the transaction hasn't been executed yet and the payout is created. This is the initial status of a fiat payout.

oneOf.title: Payout Pending Status

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been initiated and the payout is pending. The funds have been transferred to the provider and payout is being processed.

oneOf.title: Payout On Hold Status

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been initiated and the payout is on hold. Review of the transaction is being conducted and the Mural team will reach out if more information is needed.

oneOf.title: Payout Completed Status

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been executed and the payout is completed. The funds have been received by the recipient. This is a terminal status.

oneOf.title: Payout Failed Status

errorCode.description: Error code categorizing the failure reason

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been initiated but the payout has failed. This is a terminal status. Reach out to support to mural support.

oneOf.title: Payout Canceled Status
oneOf.description: Status when the transaction wasn't initiated because the sender canceled the transaction. This is a terminal status.

fiatPayoutStatus.description: The status of the fiat payout to the recipient. A successful payout will followthese statuses: created to either canceled or pending, in the case of pending, the recipient willbe able to see the amount of the payout and the status of the payout. Then the payout can resultin any of the completed, failed, or canceled terminal statuses.

fiatAmount.description: The fiat amount to payout to the recipient

transactionFee.description: The flat transaction fee for the fiat payout

exchangeFeePercentage.description: The total fee for the transaction (in percentile) applied at transaction execution time. This is applied to the source token amount. For example, a value of 3 means 3%.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate for the transaction. The rate at which the token amount will be converted to fiat. The units are destination fiat per token.

feeTotal.description: The total fee for the fiat payout

developerFee.description: The developer fee applied to this payout. The developer fee percentage applied to this payout and collected on your behalf. This fee percentage is applied to the source token amount at execution time.

oneOf.description: Details pertaining to a specific recipient's payout

status.description: The status of the blockchain payout. The initial status is AWAITING_EXECUTION, and the status will change to PENDING. EXECUTED, FAILED, and CANCELED are terminal statuses. EXECUTED indicates the blockchain transaction associated with the transfer has been executed.

oneOf.title: Counterparty Payout Recipient Info

counterpartyId.description: The ID of the counterparty used as the recipient

payoutMethodId.description: The ID of the payout method used as the payout method

oneOf.description: Recipient information for payouts created using counterparty and payout method references

oneOf.title: Inline Payout Recipient Info
Inline Fiat Payout Recipient Details

details.description: Bank account details for the inline fiat payout

fiatCurrencyCode.description: The fiat currency code for this bank account

truncatedBankAccountNumber.description: Truncated bank account number for privacy (format: ****1234)

allOf.description: General bank account information for inline fiat payouts

oneOf.description: Details about an inline fiat payout recipient. This includes recipient information and bank details.

oneOf.title: Inline Blockchain Payout Recipient Details

walletAddress.description: The wallet address receiving the payout

blockchain.description: The blockchain network for this payout

oneOf.description: Details about an inline blockchain payout recipient. This includes recipient information and wallet details.

details.description: Details about the inline recipient, discriminated by payout type (fiat or blockchain)

oneOf.description: Recipient information for payouts created using inline recipient and payout details

recipientInfo.description: Information about how this payout recipient was specified - either via counterparty reference or inline details

items.description: Information about a recipient of a payout request

post.description: Creates a Payout Request. The Payout Request can have multiple recipients, each of which can be a fiat or blockchain payout.

parameters.name: on-behalf-of
parameters.description: Organization ID to act on behalf of

sourceAccountId.description: The ID of the source account to be used for the payout

payouts.description: The list of payouts to be made. Maximum of 350 payouts allowed.

amount.description: The token amount to be paid out

developerFee.description: This fee will be added to the base fees associated with this payout and it will be applied to the source token amount. It will be collected on your behalf and paid out to you at an agreed upon cadence. Reach out to the Mural support team to enable this feature.

fiatAndRailDetails.description: The fiat and rail details (if applicable) for the payout. This specifies the currency in which the fiat will be delivered.

transferType.description: The transfer type for USD payouts. Defaults to ACH if not provided.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the recipient

bankAccountNumber.description: The bank account number of the recipient

documentNumber.description: The document number of the recipient

documentType.description: The type of document that the documentNumber corresponds to

iban.description: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the recipient

swiftBic.description: The SWIFT / Bank Identifier Code (BIC) of the recipient

oneOf.title: BRL Details

pixAccountType.description: The PIX account type. If not provided, the payout will be processed as a wire transfer.

pixEmail.description: PIX email key. Required when pixAccountType is EMAIL.

pixPhone.description: PIX phone number key. Required when pixAccountType is PHONE.

bankAccountNumber.description: Bank account number (EVP key for PIX BANK_ACCOUNT type). Required when pixAccountType is BANK_ACCOUNT or for wire transfers.

branchCode.description: Branch code. Required for wire transfers (when pixAccountType is not provided).

oneOf.description: Deprecated in favor of the BRL Payment method via the payment method API

oneOf.title: Counterparty Payout Method

payoutMethodId.description: The ID of the payout method to use

developerFee.description: This fee will be added to the base fees associated with this payout and it will be applied to the source token amount. Only valid for fiat payout methods. Will throw an error if used with blockchain payout methods.

oneOf.description: This payout details type can only be used for counterparty payouts. The recipient must be a counterparty.

firstName.description: The first name of the individual

lastName.description: The last name of the individual

physicalAddress.description: The physical address of the individual recipient.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. See: GET /utilities/countries/{fiatRailCode}

state.description: State or province. ISO 3166-2 subdivision code (minus the country prefix) for the state. See: GET /utilities/countries/{fiatRailCode}

physicalAddress.description: The physical address of the recipient business.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. See: GET /utilities/countries/{fiatRailCode}

state.description: State or province. ISO 3166-2 subdivision code (minus the country prefix) for the state. See: GET /utilities/countries/{fiatRailCode}

oneOf.title: Counterparty

counterpartyId.description: The ID of the counterparty to use as the recipient

oneOf.description: This recipient type can only be used for counterparty payouts. The payout details must be a counterparty payout method.

supportingDetails.description: Supporting information for the payout. See "Supporting Details Requirements" in the Compliance Requirements section on the Guides page for more information on when this information is required.

supportingDocument.description:
**Supporting Document**

A base64 encoded file showing the purpose for the payout.

- **Format**: Base64 encoded data URI. File size must be less than 10MB.
- **Examples**: Invoice, receipt, contract, etc.
- **Note**: See "Supporting Details Requirements" in the Compliance Requirements section on the Guides page for information on when this is required.

payoutPurpose.description: The purpose of the payout. See "Supporting Details Requirements" in the Compliance Requirements section on the Guides page for information on when this is required.

items.description: Information for the specific payout to be made.

transactionHash.description: The transaction hash of the blockchain transaction. Present when the status is EXECUTED.

status.description: The status of the overall payout request. The initial status is AWAITING_EXECUTION, and the status will change to PENDING. EXECUTED, FAILED, and CANCELED are terminal statuses. EXECUTED indicates the blockchain transaction associated with the entire payout has been executed, but that does not mean your recipients have received funds. Check the individual recipientsPayoutDetails for the status of each recipient.

payouts.description: Information associated with each recipient's payout included in the original payout request.

oneOf.title: Fiat Payout

fiatAndRailCode.description: The fiat and rail code, if applicable, for the payout. This corresponds to the type discriminator of the fiatAndRailDetails field in the payout request.

oneOf.title: Payout Created Status
oneOf.description: Status when the transaction hasn't been executed yet and the payout is created. This is the initial status of a fiat payout.

oneOf.title: Payout Pending Status

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been initiated and the payout is pending. The funds have been transferred to the provider and payout is being processed.

oneOf.title: Payout On Hold Status

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been initiated and the payout is on hold. Review of the transaction is being conducted and the Mural team will reach out if more information is needed.

oneOf.title: Payout Completed Status

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been executed and the payout is completed. The funds have been received by the recipient. This is a terminal status.

oneOf.title: Payout Failed Status

errorCode.description: Error code categorizing the failure reason

initiatedAt.description: The payout has been initiated with the local banking provider

oneOf.description: Status when the transaction has been initiated but the payout has failed. This is a terminal status. Reach out to support to mural support.

oneOf.title: Payout Canceled Status
oneOf.description: Status when the transaction wasn't initiated because the sender canceled the transaction. This is a terminal status.

fiatPayoutStatus.description: The status of the fiat payout to the recipient. A successful payout will followthese statuses: created to either canceled or pending, in the case of pending, the recipient willbe able to see the amount of the payout and the status of the payout. Then the payout can resultin any of the completed, failed, or canceled terminal statuses.

fiatAmount.description: The fiat amount to payout to the recipient

transactionFee.description: The flat transaction fee for the fiat payout

exchangeFeePercentage.description: The total fee for the transaction (in percentile) applied at transaction execution time. This is applied to the source token amount. For example, a value of 3 means 3%.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate for the transaction. The rate at which the token amount will be converted to fiat. The units are destination fiat per token.

feeTotal.description: The total fee for the fiat payout

developerFee.description: The developer fee applied to this payout. The developer fee percentage applied to this payout and collected on your behalf. This fee percentage is applied to the source token amount at execution time.

oneOf.description: Details pertaining to a specific recipient's payout

status.description: The status of the blockchain payout. The initial status is AWAITING_EXECUTION, and the status will change to PENDING. EXECUTED, FAILED, and CANCELED are terminal statuses. EXECUTED indicates the blockchain transaction associated with the transfer has been executed.

uboOwnershipDocuments.description:
Mural is required to confirm all individual ultimate beneficial owners who own 25% or more of the underlying entity.

Business ownership must be either attested by a control person or substantiated with an ownership document.

KYC on all Beneficial Owners and/or Control Owners (per US or International requirements).

All Ultimate Beneficial Owners (UBO): Individual or entity that has complete ownership and control over a business, institution, or legal entity or Control Person (if different than the Ultimate Beneficial Owners): an individual with significant responsibility to control or direct business; typically an executive officer (CEO, CFO, COO, President).

A successful payout will followthese statuses: created to either canceled or pending, in the case of pending, the recipient willbe able to see the amount of the payout and the status of the payout. Then the payout can resultin any of the completed, failed, or canceled terminal statuses.

feeTotal.description: The total fee for the fiat payout

developerFee.description: The developer fee applied to this payout. The developer fee percentage applied to this payout and collected on your behalf. This fee percentage is applied to the source token amount at execution time.

uboOwnershipDocuments.description:
Mural is required to confirm all individual ultimate beneficial owners who own 25% or more of the underlying entity.

Business ownership must be either attested by a control person or substantiated with an ownership document.

KYC on all Beneficial Owners and/or Control Owners (per US or International requirements).

All Ultimate Beneficial Owners (UBO): Individual or entity that has complete ownership and control over a business, institution, or legal entity or Control Person (if different than the Ultimate Beneficial Owners): an individual with significant responsibility to control or direct business; typically an executive officer (CEO, CFO, COO, President).
